title: Baker Mayfield, Browns, 49ers, & the Herd Hierarchy
itunes:title: Baker Mayfield, Browns, 49ers, & the Herd Hierarchy
description:
Colin discusses the Cleveland Browns-San Francisco 49ers Monday night game, the issues with the Browns, and why he feels they should trade Odell Beckham Jr.. He also explains the strengths of the Niners, and his new Herd Hierarchy. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Peter King, Trent Dilfer, Reggie Bush, and Cameron Jordan.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
